languages.text: "Об этом пока рано говорить, внутренний регламент Арбитес предусматривает довольно долгий переход в новый ранг. Многое может измениться к моменту, когда получу назначение".

traits.locale_text: "Об этом пока рано говорить, внутренний регламент Арбитес предусматривает довольно долгий переход в новый ранг. Многое может измениться к моменту, когда получу назначение".

languages.text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
languages.original_text: "Об этом пока рано говорить, внутренний регламент Арбитес предусматривает довольно долгий переход в новый ранг. Многое может измениться к моменту, когда получу назначение".

traits.locale_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition may take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
"It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition may take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
"It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition may take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
"It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition may take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
"It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
"It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

languages.text: 「現時点ではまだ何とも言えません。高等裁定局内部の手続きのため、移行にはかなりの時間がかかるかもしれません。私に任命が下る頃には、状況が大きく変わっている可能性もあります」
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: 「現時点ではまだ何とも言えません。高等裁定局内部の手続きのため、移行にはかなりの時間がかかるかもしれません。私に任命が下る頃には、状況が大きく変わっている可能性もあります」

languages.text: "Es ist noch zu früh, das zu sagen. Aufgrund der internen Verfahren der Arbites könnte der Übergang langwierig werden. Bis ich meinen Auftrag erhalte, hat sich womöglich schon viel verändert."
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist noch zu früh, das zu sagen. Aufgrund der internen Verfahren der Arbites könnte der Übergang langwierig werden. Bis ich meinen Auftrag erhalte, hat sich womöglich schon viel verändert."

languages.text: « Il est trop tôt pour le dire. La transition risque de prendre un certain temps en raison des procédures internes de l'Arbites. Beaucoup de choses pourraient changer avant que je sois officiellement affecté à ce poste. »
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: « Il est trop tôt pour le dire. La transition risque de prendre un certain temps en raison des procédures internes de l'Arbites. Beaucoup de choses pourraient changer avant que je sois officiellement affecté à ce poste. »

languages.text: «Aún es pronto para saberlo; dados los procedimientos internos del Arbites, la transición podría llevar un tiempo. Podrían haber cambiado muchas cosas para cuando por fin jure el cargo».
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: «Aún es pronto para saberlo; dados los procedimientos internos del Arbites, la transición podría llevar un tiempo. Podrían haber cambiado muchas cosas para cuando por fin jure el cargo».

languages.text: “现在下结论恐怕还为时过早。由于法务部的内部程序，权力交接可能还需要等一段时间，等到我就任的时候，情况可能会和现在截然不同。”
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: “现在下结论恐怕还为时过早。由于法务部的内部程序，权力交接可能还需要等一段时间，等到我就任的时候，情况可能会和现在截然不同。”

languages.text: "Şu noktada bir şey demek zor. Arbites prosedürleri gereği görev değişikliği zaman alacaktır. Ben makama geçene dek çok şey değişebilir."
languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition might take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."

traits.locale_text: "Şu noktada bir şey demek zor, zira iç Arbites prosedürleri gereği görev değişikliği zaman alacaktır. Ben makama geçene dek çok şey değişebilir."

languages.original_text: "It is too early to say at this point — due to the internal Arbites procedures, the transition may take quite a while. Much could change by the time I receive my assignment."
